column4: Anyone have ideas for a work around?  I may have hit a fatal flaw that won't allow me to install gutsy.  The installer won't recognize that I have two ide hard drives.  One for root, and one for home.
it does not see your two hdds?
It sees hda but not hdb, and won't let me include hdb in the partitioner
I can mount hdb (home) with the live disk, but it still won't let me include it with the partitioner
